page.title: 11GAMES
page.content: Junior games from the age of 5 to 11 consist of marbles,skipping,hoola hoop,war,cars,mummy's and daddy's,ball,kiss chase,40 to 40 which is a version of hide and seek where you have to get to the person who was counting's post without being seen.It is also known as Pom Pom.Schools organize Swimming,rounders,stoolball,hockey,net ball,tennis,football,gymnastics and running. Senior games from the age of 11 to 16 include discus, javelin, shotput, running, stoolball, rounders, softball, netball, hockey, football, table tennis, badminton, gymnastics, long jump, high jump, crosscountry, basketball, tennis, cricket, volleyball, football. By Tracy Jones and Claire Wingate.
